description:
The OpenStack API v1.1 spec requires that errors that happen asynchronously (from a PUT/POST/DELETE request) be communicated through a subsequent GET on the corresponding entity. For example, if nova-network fails to allocate a fixed ip on server creation, that should be communicated back to the user.

http://docs.openstack.org/cactus/openstack-compute/developer/openstack-compute-api-1.1/content/Asynchronous_Faults-d1e2009.html
title: OSAPI v1.1 Asynchronous Faults
